blog.name: worstloki
blog.title: Chaotic Neutral
blog.description: pronouns dont bother me, use whatever -  I will fite you - follow me for incorrect quotes, good murder and a lot of eyeliner

summary:
Thor: We need to talk about- 
Loki: Asgard was already on fire when I got there 
Thor: What? 
Loki: What.
body:
Thor: We need to talk about- 
Loki: Asgard was already on fire when I got there 
Thor: What? 
Loki: What.

dialogue.name: Loki

dialogue.phrase: Asgard was already on fire when I got there

blog.name: incorrect-marvel-vines
blog.title: Incorrect Marvel Vines
blog.description: I spilled marvel in your Valentino white bag. I am also basically a stony hoe

body: Tony threw that paper

reblog.comment: Tony threw that paper

trail.content_raw: Tony threw that paper

body:
Peter Parker/ Spider-Man - “What the hell?!”

Your POV

That was awkward.

It were the last weeks of school. Everything should be good. But clumsy as I am I managed to run into Peter Parker. Nothing awkward with that, well not unnatural much, but we fell to the floor because he was running. We fell onto each other. That was weird even for someone like me. His face was inches away from mine and I could feel his breath against my cheek. Peter got up fast and cleared his throat. When he noticed I was still on the floor he quickly extended his hand and helped me up. I blushed as I felt a shiver going down my spine. Thanks to me for having a giant fricking crush on Peter Parker. “Sorry, I didn’t expect to crush on someone. I mean- to crash into someone. Oh my god, I…just…I’ll just stop talking.”, I mumbled. Peter smiled and shook my hand which he was surprisingly still holding. “I’m Peter. Peter Parker.”, he said. I nodded: “I know.” I took my hand from his. “Okay, that sounded creepy.” He shook his head. “I have to go.”, I said quickly. I turned around and to the school doors. “Wait!”, I heard Peter yell after me. I turned to him again. “I didn’t get your name.”, he said walking towards me a bit. “(Y/N).”, I slightly smiled at thought that I talked to, actually talked to him, not just in my head. Or with my computer. Peter smiled genuinely at me and walked away. I walked out of the building and straight into a puddle. Lucky me. Happy would be there any minute.

The next day in PE I sat next to MJ who was reading a book. She took her books everywhere. Stop complaining, you do that too. Yes, I have a book with me but I’m not reading it right now. I’m the typical nerd. Good in school, always having the nose in a book, big glasses on a not so pretty face, skinny. You are a nerd who is way too supernatural to be a typical nerd. Yes, that too. I got some.. “Let’s start with the training. Team up with a partner and start with push-ups. Continue with sit-ups.”, the coach’s voice startled me. MJ turned to me and asked if I would team up with her. “Sure.”

On my way to the mats someone bumped into me. “Sorry.”, Peter Parker said. “No big deal.”, I smiled and turned to MJ who had a curious look on her face. “What is going on with your future husband?”, my cheeks turned crimson red. “Stop!”, I whisper-yelled. She grinned. “Just start already.”

I got onto the mat and started doing push-ups. Michelle started to look at me weird when I just continued. After 70 push-ups my arm muscles were burning. I got on my knees and took a deep breath. “What was that? Nobody does 70 push-ups like it’s nothing. Especially not you.” I rolled my eyes. “Why thank you for the boost of confidence. It’s your turn.” Michelle groaned and started but she laid flat after 20.

“I’m dying.”, she groaned for the second time. I giggled. “Get up and let me do the sit-ups. She obliged and held my feet to the ground while I was getting started. I couldn’t resist overhearing a conversation.

"Go talk to her.”, someone said. “No! She is way out of my league.”, said Peter. So clearly it wasn’t spoken about me. Sadly.

I continued with sit-ups until my stomach muscles were burning. I was exhausted. Soon the lesson was over and I followed MJ to the changing rooms.

In Physics I couldn’t concentrate because 1. I was sitting behind Peter and 2. My powers started kicking in again. I just looked at the metal ball in front of me tapping my fingers against the table and soon the ball was a sheet. I gasped and grabbed it, hopefully fast enough. I couldn’t wait for the afternoon with Wanda and training.

Oh yeah, I am a bender. I can control the elements plus blood, mind and metal. My powers surfaced when I was extremely pissed at Tony, for not asking me if I wanted to be adopted by him and Pepper. He did it anyways. Making me a Stark. (Y/N) Stark.

I didn’t mind now. He was always kind of a father for me and he treated me as his own child.

The bell took me back to reality and I packed my stuff. I could see my veins in my arms turning crimson red. I rolled my sleeves down and speeded out of the room. I heard someone yell my name but I didn’t listen. I ran to the bathrooms and looked into the mirror only to see my eyes turning white. I could still see but it was different. I had to get of here.

Before something worse happens.

I pulled my hood deep enough to cover the red fire like veins and the white eyes. I left the bathroom looking left and right to find nobody. I hurried to the exit only to be stopped in my tracks when I recognize Peter standing there waiting for me. “Oh no. Not now.”, I groaned quietly. “Hey.”, he said. I tried to not lift my head to his voice. I walked around him and out of the building.

I blinked a few times stumbling down the stairs to the street. “Hey, easy there. Are you okay?”, he tried to grab my arm and help me but I yanked it away. “Do not touch me.”, I said with gritted teeth. He backed away at the sight of my angry expression. He was scared. I didn’t want to scare him. Not Peter. I blinked and got away quickly to the black SUV which was already waiting for me. Happy got out as he saw the state I was in. He opened the door for me.

On the way the Avengers Base I tried to calm down. I jumped right out of the car when I saw a Jet landing on the platform. It was dangerous for the people to be around me. I didn’t want to hurt them. I already hurt Tony and Pepper once. I ran away back then and that’s what I was intending to do now too.

But Bucky and Wanda were already there. Bucky grabbed my arms and Wanda tapped my forehead to put me to sleep.

Drenched in sweat I woke up again. Wanda sat in the armchair next to my bed and Bucky spoke quietly with Tony. “Did I hurt anyone?”, I asked with a hoarse voice. I need water. They all turned to me. Tony rushed to my side and grabbed my hand. “Are you okay?”, he asked quietly. I smiled lightly and nodded. “I just need some water.” At that very moment Vision came through the wall with a big glass of water. “Thank you.”, he smiled and stood behind Wanda. “How are you, honey?”, another voice said. Pepper. She kissed my forehead. “I’m better than – wait, what day is it?”, I wrinkled my brows. Bucky answered: “You were asleep for 5 days, (Y/N).” I groaned. Not again. I could feel something going through my veins. I shivered but it didn’t go away. I looked at my arms. The veins were red again. “Leave.”, I said. Pepper kissed my forehead one more time and Tony squeezed my hand and Bucky just nudged my leg. Wanda and Vision stayed and took my hands. I started to scream as the fire went through my body. I could feel it in my head, in my chest and even in my toes. Wanda and Vision tried their best to help me through this. At some point it all went black.

The next time I awoke it was from loud yelling. I opened my eyes and looked around in my room. I was alone. I sat up and got out of bed to follow the loud voices. They were downstairs.

“No! I am not going to do this!”, that was Tony. “She is dangerous!”, Steve Rogers. “Just because you are not used to supernatural beings doesn’t mean that they are not allowed to exist! You are intolerant! I thought your name was standing for Righteousness but I guess I was wrong!”, Bucky. “Guys, calm down! She can learn to control her powers! She is just at the beginning! Steve, give her a chance.”, Natasha. I went downstairs but hid behind the corner. “You do know what happened last time she lost control. She-” I was deadly calm when I started to walk inside the room. They stared at me with wide eyes. “She can speak for herself.”, I said when I stood in front of Steve. Bruce came up to me and Steve. “Steve, you gave me a chance. So why not her?” Steve looked at his friend and nodded. “Fine.”

From this moment I never wanted to be in the same room as Steve.

~~~~~~

A few weeks later was my graduation. Tony, Pepper, Wanda, Bruce, Natasha and Thor came. They all clapped when I got my diploma.

When I headed to my family Peter came up to me. “Hey.”, he said cautiously. We hadn’t talked since the incident in front of the school. “Hi.”, I responded. “Uhm..I wanted to talk to you.” I laughed a bit: “Me too.” He scratched the back of his neck. “I don’t know what was up with you a few weeks ago but I don’t care anymore. But I would be willing to find out. I uhm…like you and I want to get to know you. That sounds so weird. Uhm..” I laughed a bit as we continued to walk towards Tony and the others. “I actually wanted to apologize for what happened back then. I didn’t have control…I’m sorry. And oh, I like you too.” You love him, you idiot. We don’t even know each other, you assbutt.

Peter wanted to say something whenTony decided to interrupt him: “Oi, Spider-Boy. Don’t touch my daughter!”, he came with a grin at us and pointed his index finger at Peter. Spider-Boy? I rolled my eyes and thought about the term Tony used on Peter, as if they knew each other. Peter on the other hand was shocked. “Daughter? You are Mr. Stark’s daughter?”, he went pale. “Yes, she is. And don’t even think about starting something. If I catch you even looking at her I swear-” “Dad!”, I cut him off. Both looked at me. “Dad?”, they said in unison. I put my hand over my mouth. “That’s the first time you ever said ‘Dad’ to me.” I could have sworn I saw a tear in his eye.

“First: Yes, Peter, I am his daughter. Adoptive but well…I am his daughter. Second: Dad, you are not going to stop me if I want to spend time with Peter. And Third: Spider-Boy?”

Dad smiled and put a hand on Peter’s shoulder who was in fact still pale and quiet and afraid.

“(Y/N), you joined the Avengers a few weeks ago when you learned how to control your powers.”, Dad started but I cut him off again. “Dad, what are-” “Let me speak, child.” He grinned and looked at Peter. Peter looked at me with wide eyes. “(Y/N), I want you to meet the newest member of the Avengers. Peter Parker aka Spider-Boy.” “Spider-Man. It’s actually Spider-Man.”, Peter whispered looking me in the eyes. I was shocked. “What the hell?!”

I rolled my eyes and thought about the term Tony used on Peter, as if they knew each other. Peter on the other hand was shocked. “Daughter? You are Mr. Stark’s daughter?”, he went pale. “Yes, she is. And don’t even think about starting something. If I catch you even looking at her I swear-” “Dad!”, I cut him off. Both looked at me. “Dad?”, they said in unison. I put my hand over my mouth. “That’s the first time you ever said ‘Dad’ to me.” I could have sworn I saw a tear in his eye.

“First: Yes, Peter, I am his daughter. Adoptive but well…I am his daughter. Second: Dad, you are not going to stop me if I want to spend time with Peter. And Third: Spider-Boy?”

Dad smiled and put a hand on Peter’s shoulder who was in fact still pale and quiet and afraid.

“(Y/N), you joined the Avengers a few weeks ago when you learned how to control your powers.”, Dad started but I cut him off again. “Dad, what are-” “Let me speak, child.” He grinned and looked at Peter. Peter looked at me with wide eyes. “(Y/N), I want you to meet the newest member of the Avengers. Peter Parker aka Spider-Boy.” “Spider-Man. It’s actually Spider-Man.”, Peter whispered looking me in the eyes. I was shocked. “What the hell?!”
trail.content:
Peter Parker/ Spider-Man - “What the hell?!”

Your POV

That was awkward.

It were the last weeks of school. Everything should be good. But clumsy as I am I managed to run into Peter Parker. Nothing awkward with that, well not unnatural much, but we fell to the floor because he was running. We fell onto each other. That was weird even for someone like me. His face was inches away from mine and I could feel his breath against my cheek. Peter got up fast and cleared his throat. When he noticed I was still on the floor he quickly extended his hand and helped me up. I blushed as I felt a shiver going down my spine. Thanks to me for having a giant fricking crush on Peter Parker. “Sorry, I didn’t expect to crush on someone. I mean- to crash into someone. Oh my god, I…just…I’ll just stop talking.”, I mumbled. Peter smiled and shook my hand which he was surprisingly still holding. “I’m Peter. Peter Parker.”, he said. I nodded: “I know.” I took my hand from his. “Okay, that sounded creepy.” He shook his head. “I have to go.”, I said quickly. I turned around and to the school doors. “Wait!”, I heard Peter yell after me. I turned to him again. “I didn’t get your name.”, he said walking towards me a bit. “(Y/N).”, I slightly smiled at thought that I talked to, actually talked to him, not just in my head. Or with my computer. Peter smiled genuinely at me and walked away. I walked out of the building and straight into a puddle. Lucky me. Happy would be there any minute.

The next day in PE I sat next to MJ who was reading a book. She took her books everywhere. Stop complaining, you do that too. Yes, I have a book with me but I’m not reading it right now. I’m the typical nerd. Good in school, always having the nose in a book, big glasses on a not so pretty face, skinny. You are a nerd who is way too supernatural to be a typical nerd. Yes, that too. I got some.. “Let’s start with the training. Team up with a partner and start with push-ups. Continue with sit-ups.”, the coach’s voice startled me. MJ turned to me and asked if I would team up with her. “Sure.”

On my way to the mats someone bumped into me. “Sorry.”, Peter Parker said. “No big deal.”, I smiled and turned to MJ who had a curious look on her face. “What is going on with your future husband?”, my cheeks turned crimson red. “Stop!”, I whisper-yelled. She grinned. “Just start already.”

I got onto the mat and started doing push-ups. Michelle started to look at me weird when I just continued. After 70 push-ups my arm muscles were burning. I got on my knees and took a deep breath. “What was that? Nobody does 70 push-ups like it’s nothing. Especially not you.” I rolled my eyes. “Why thank you for the boost of confidence. It’s your turn.” Michelle groaned and started but she laid flat after 20.

“I’m dying.”, she groaned for the second time. I giggled. “Get up and let me do the sit-ups. She obliged and held my feet to the ground while I was getting started. I couldn’t resist overhearing a conversation.

"Go talk to her.”, someone said. “No! She is way out of my league.”, said Peter. So clearly it wasn’t spoken about me. Sadly.

I continued with sit-ups until my stomach muscles were burning. I was exhausted. Soon the lesson was over and I followed MJ to the changing rooms.

In Physics I couldn’t concentrate because 1. I was sitting behind Peter and 2. My powers started kicking in again. I just looked at the metal ball in front of me tapping my fingers against the table and soon the ball was a sheet. I gasped and grabbed it, hopefully fast enough. I couldn’t wait for the afternoon with Wanda and training.

Oh yeah, I am a bender. I can control the elements plus blood, mind and metal. My powers surfaced when I was extremely pissed at Tony, for not asking me if I wanted to be adopted by him and Pepper. He did it anyways. Making me a Stark. (Y/N) Stark.

I didn’t mind now. He was always kind of a father for me and he treated me as his own child.

The bell took me back to reality and I packed my stuff. I could see my veins in my arms turning crimson red. I rolled my sleeves down and speeded out of the room. I heard someone yell my name but I didn’t listen. I ran to the bathrooms and looked into the mirror only to see my eyes turning white. I could still see but it was different. I had to get of here.

Before something worse happens.

I pulled my hood deep enough to cover the red fire like veins and the white eyes. I left the bathroom looking left and right to find nobody. I hurried to the exit only to be stopped in my tracks when I recognize Peter standing there waiting for me. “Oh no. Not now.”, I groaned quietly. “Hey.”, he said. I tried to not lift my head to his voice. I walked around him and out of the building.

I blinked a few times stumbling down the stairs to the street. “Hey, easy there. Are you okay?”, he tried to grab my arm and help me but I yanked it away. “Do not touch me.”, I said with gritted teeth. He backed away at the sight of my angry expression. He was scared. I didn’t want to scare him. Not Peter. I blinked and got away quickly to the black SUV which was already waiting for me. Happy got out as he saw the state I was in. He opened the door for me.

On the way the Avengers Base I tried to calm down. I jumped right out of the car when I saw a Jet landing on the platform. It was dangerous for the people to be around me. I didn’t want to hurt them. I already hurt Tony and Pepper once. I ran away back then and that’s what I was intending to do now too.

But Bucky and Wanda were already there. Bucky grabbed my arms and Wanda tapped my forehead to put me to sleep.

Drenched in sweat I woke up again. Wanda sat in the armchair next to my bed and Bucky spoke quietly with Tony. “Did I hurt anyone?”, I asked with a hoarse voice. I need water. They all turned to me. Tony rushed to my side and grabbed my hand. “Are you okay?”, he asked quietly. I smiled lightly and nodded. “I just need some water.” At that very moment Vision came through the wall with a big glass of water. “Thank you.”, he smiled and stood behind Wanda. “How are you, honey?”, another voice said. Pepper. She kissed my forehead. “I’m better than – wait, what day is it?”, I wrinkled my brows. Bucky answered: “You were asleep for 5 days, (Y/N).” I groaned. Not again. I could feel something going through my veins. I shivered but it didn’t go away. I looked at my arms. The veins were red again. “Leave.”, I said. Pepper kissed my forehead one more time and Tony squeezed my hand and Bucky just nudged my leg. Wanda and Vision stayed and took my hands. I started to scream as the fire went through my body. I could feel it in my head, in my chest and even in my toes. Wanda and Vision tried their best to help me through this. At some point it all went black.

The next time I awoke it was from loud yelling. I opened my eyes and looked around in my room. I was alone. I sat up and got out of bed to follow the loud voices. They were downstairs.

“No! I am not going to do this!”, that was Tony. “She is dangerous!”, Steve Rogers. “Just because you are not used to supernatural beings doesn’t mean that they are not allowed to exist! You are intolerant! I thought your name was standing for Righteousness but I guess I was wrong!”, Bucky. “Guys, calm down! She can learn to control her powers! She is just at the beginning! Steve, give her a chance.”, Natasha. I went downstairs but hid behind the corner. “You do know what happened last time she lost control. She-” I was deadly calm when I started to walk inside the room. They stared at me with wide eyes. “She can speak for herself.”, I said when I stood in front of Steve. Bruce came up to me and Steve. “Steve, you gave me a chance. So why not her?” Steve looked at his friend and nodded. “Fine.”

From this moment I never wanted to be in the same room as Steve.

~~~~~~

A few weeks later was my graduation. Tony, Pepper, Wanda, Bruce, Natasha and Thor came. They all clapped when I got my diploma.

When I headed to my family Peter came up to me. “Hey.”, he said cautiously. We hadn’t talked since the incident in front of the school. “Hi.”, I responded. “Uhm..I wanted to talk to you.” I laughed a bit: “Me too.” He scratched the back of his neck. “I don’t know what was up with you a few weeks ago but I don’t care anymore. But I would be willing to find out. I uhm…like you and I want to get to know you. That sounds so weird. Uhm..” I laughed a bit as we continued to walk towards Tony and the others. “I actually wanted to apologize for what happened back then. I didn’t have control…I’m sorry. And oh, I like you too.” You love him, you idiot. We don’t even know each other, you assbutt.

Peter wanted to say something whenTony decided to interrupt him: “Oi, Spider-Boy. Don’t touch my daughter!”, he came with a grin at us and pointed his index finger at Peter. Spider-Boy? I rolled my eyes and thought about the term Tony used on Peter, as if they knew each other. Peter on the other hand was shocked. “Daughter? You are Mr. Stark’s daughter?”, he went pale. “Yes, she is. And don’t even think about starting something. If I catch you even looking at her I swear-” “Dad!”, I cut him off. Both looked at me. “Dad?”, they said in unison. I put my hand over my mouth. “That’s the first time you ever said ‘Dad’ to me.” I could have sworn I saw a tear in his eye.

“First: Yes, Peter, I am his daughter. Adoptive but well…I am his daughter. Second: Dad, you are not going to stop me if I want to spend time with Peter. And Third: Spider-Boy?”

Dad smiled and put a hand on Peter’s shoulder who was in fact still pale and quiet and afraid.

“(Y/N), you joined the Avengers a few weeks ago when you learned how to control your powers.”, Dad started but I cut him off again. “Dad, what are-” “Let me speak, child.” He grinned and looked at Peter. Peter looked at me with wide eyes. “(Y/N), I want you to meet the newest member of the Avengers. Peter Parker aka Spider-Boy.” “Spider-Man. It’s actually Spider-Man.”, Peter whispered looking me in the eyes. I was shocked. “What the hell?!”

blog.name: mousiengtime
blog.title: M(o)usi(e)ng Time
blog.description: Love anything that's unique, niche and fascinating, so I can write about it. Also, Appreciation Weeks center.

title: Avengers Steampunk AU #2
body:
Let’s start with the general structure of the story. 

I’ve planned seven parts: prologue, five parts, epilogue and a post-credits scene. 

The prologue and epilogue would be 3rd person objective from the early 20th century, when a young reporter, Peter Parker, had met an elderly man connected to the Russian spy during criesis (Red Scare) named Phil Coulson. 

All parts between would be the whole story, during which I’ve planned to implement the storyline from Iron Man to Capitan America (Winter Soldier) and some plotlines from other various movies. 

The porst-credits scene would be an introduction to Thanos and The Guardians of the Galaxy (Rocket and Groot). So… FUN, so much fun. Why can’t I simply write it? It’s so nice and interesting, and… too much history and details that I’m not avare of many facts. 

That’s general structure.

title: Touch Of My Hand
body:
Another day without a lover the more I come to understand the touch of my hand.

Touch Of My Hand

I’m not ashamed of the things that I dreamI find myself flirting with the verge of obsceneInto the unknown, I will be boldI’m going to places I can be out of control“Loki?” You whisper softly,…

Read more…

blog.description: I'm slowly bit by bit reading every comic in the Marvel reading order. Here I'll muse on different things I notice as I go about doing so.

summary: Hank is officially off the reservation. He created a robot to attack the team that he would then “save” them all from so they...
caption: Hank is officially off the reservation. He created a robot to attack the team that he would then “save” them all from so they would think hes a real hero, but instead it almost kills all of them, and Jan has to swoop in and save everyone. After this final fuck up, Hank is removed from the team.

summary: the x-men would beat the avengers, hands down
body:
the x-men would beat the avengers, hands down

don’t fight me i don’t make the rules

1. the avengers are just work friends and there’s always at least two of them arguing. the x-men are like a big happy family that will gladly kick your ass

2. there are 6 avengers (not including the addition of the infinity war avengers) and there are so. many. x-men. professor thinks you’re small and cute? congratulations, you’re an x-man.

3. the x-men have so many varied powers! need some ice in your drink? they have a guy for that. need someone to go undercover? they have a lady who does it flawlessly. need to go back in time? run through walls? read your mind? done.

4. they would both be one chaotic neutral team member down, but the x-men have had enough experience to ignore erik’s absence. loki’s gone again? thor’s pissed off and so are all the fangirls. (i still love both of them though. i adore me some disaster bi chaotic neutral badasses.)

5. the team discipline is so much better. professor x looks at them funny and they all fall into line. the avengers have difficulty recognising leaders. just: civil war. that is all.

6. the matching uniforms make them exponentially more powerful. i don’t make the rules.

7. wolverine’s magic hair.


don’t get me wrong, i adore the avengers but i love my mutant babies

blog.name: multifandomedsstuff
blog.title: fandoms-drowned-me
blog.description: sherlock | supernatural | mcu | harry potter | aos | htgawm | brooklyn 99

body:
I can’t stop thinking

about the future of MCU. Sure, there will be new superheroes to fangirl over, many memes to laugh at, many actors and actresses to love, etc… but, I will never forget nor move on from the man who started it all: Iron Man. There will come a time that we won’t see him in the big screen anymore (which is really soon) and that is really heartbreaking.

blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: If Only The Lost Return
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OMe6De

by mayinwinter

The gems were breaking into shards, collapsing and taking with them the mind and the heart of their last wielder, the golden son of Asgard, and and and-

Loki grasped with both hands the head of his moronic, insensate, arrogant idiot of a brother, feeling his own heart beating frantically at his throat, closed his eyes, and along with everyone else, Loki screamed.

Words: 2287, Chapters: 1/8, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Thor (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Loki (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Stephen Strange, Bruce Banner, Shuri (Marvel), T'Challa (Marvel), Nick Fury
  • Relationships: Loki/Thor (Marvel), James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, Wanda Maximoff/Vision, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, others as secondary pairings
  • Additional Tags: Post-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie), fix it and resurrections of sorts, Canon Divergence, loki lives and there was a plan all along, defeating thanos at a questionable price, All Magic Comes With a Price, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, slow to mid burn, Pseudo-Incest, Jotunn Loki (Marvel), a glimpse into loki’s role in past movies and tying loose ends, Thor learns and grows and is made better for it, Loki learns and grows and is made slightly less unstable for it, love and respect go hand in hand, past torture and scars


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OMe6De

title: Beyond The Walls of Sleep
body:
It started with a portal, a battle for humanity, an empty coffin at Tony Stark’s funeral. Then a distress signal. A last ditch covert-op. A recon mission with little hope of success. Four years too late they bring Tony home.

Chapter 1

There were bad ideas. And then there was this idea.The mission briefing was a tense affair. Fury generally looked like he was pretty much brimming over with barely contained temper but today there was…

Read more…
